name: Rise: Race The Future
description: Experience the most addictive racing gameplay! Drift and slide like never before thanks to an exceptional fluid and precise physics-based slippery handling. Unique futuristic cars, smooth powerslides, jumps and water zones take old-school rally arcade games to the next level of fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 64bits Processor: Core I3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 10 64bits Processor: Core I5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 or AMD R9 270 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
